main event: A sighting of a bright light hovering in the air over Stockton, California, in July 1954, which then moved off at high speed and disappeared over a mountain.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 7 seconds,It was described as having a silvery, hazy glow with no detailed features,The object hovered at an elevation of 15-30 ft above ground,Single witness, Mrs. Sally, a housewife from Stockton, provided a reliable account of the sighting,The sighting occurred during clear weather conditions.
witness description: Mrs. Sally, a 35-year-old housewife from Stockton, California
